definitions: Removing a substance from the surface of a liquid.
Reading something quickly to grasp the main points.
Taking money illegally, especially by not reporting all income.
Moving quickly and lightly over a surface.
examples: She was skimming the fat off the top of the soup.
He spent an hour skimming through the report.
The criminals were skimming profits from the business.
The stone was skimming across the water.
